net.corda.core.contracts

Class InsufficientBalanceException


  • public class InsufficientBalanceException

    Thrown if a request is made to spend an amount of a interface FungibleAsset but there aren't enough tokens in the vault.

    See Also:
    interface FungibleAsset

    • Constructor Detail

      • InsufficientBalanceException

        public InsufficientBalanceException(@NotNull
                                    Amount<?> amountMissing)

        Thrown if a request is made to spend an amount of a interface FungibleAsset but there aren't enough tokens in the vault.

        Parameters:
        amountMissing - An class Amount that specifies how many tokens were missing.
        See Also:
        interface FungibleAsset
